word_mean: 任意的，可选择的：能适应不同情况的
兼性的：在细菌学中，指既能在有氧又能在无氧的环境中生长的细菌

sentence.Network_en: All the photosynthetic bacteria possess the capability in addition to various facultative aerobes and obligate anaerobes.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有光合细菌加上各种兼性的好氧生物和绝对的厌氧生物具有这种能力.

sentence.Network_en: Nitrate can be used by facultative organisms living under intermediate conditions referred to as anoxic.
sentence.Network_cn: 硝酸盐能够被生活在中等缺氧条件下称为兼性生物体所利用.

sentence.Network_en: A facultative anaerobic bacillus strain Xg 01 is isolated from the dirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 从污物中分离出一株兼性厌氧芽孢杆菌,它可产生大量的果胶酶.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 医学英语 ... electronic colposcope 电子阴道镜 Facultative 兼性 Faeces 粪便.
生物科学词汇（简体） ... facilitation 促进作用 facultative 兼性的 facultative aerobe 兼性需氧菌；兼性需氧生物.
facultative parthenogenesis 兼性孤雌生殖facultative 兼性因素family selection 家庭选择
乡村医疗卫生资源应用系统 ... facultative sterility 避孕性不育 facultative 任意的；机能上的 Faget law 法盖特氏法则.

list.abs: ...兼性好氧菌即兼性厌氧菌。兼性厌氧菌（facultative anaerobe）又称兼嫌气性微生物，兼嫌气菌、兼性好氧菌。在有氧或无氧环境中均能生长繁殖的。可在有氧（O2）或缺氧条.
factual knowledge 事实性知识facultative variant 随机变量faculty 才能
临时分保临时分保（facultative reinsurance）在保险学中的定义是：分出根据业务需要，临时选择分保接受人，经分保双方协商达成协议，的分保方法。本内容来源于
facultative anaerobe 兼性厌氧菌facultative parthenogenesis 偶发单性生殖facultative respiration 兼性呼吸

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French facultatif, -ive, from faculté (see faculty)

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the mental faculties
2. able to exist under more than one set of conditions;

sentences.sentence: "a facultative parasite can exist as a parasite or a saprophyte"

means.word_mean: 3. granting a privilege or permission or power to do or not do something;

auth_sentence.content: "We still lack data to understand when and why facultative parthenogenesis happens in the wild," says Watts.
auth_sentence.res_content: "We still lack data to understand when and why facultative parthenogenesis happens in the wild," says Watts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "We still lack data to understand when and why facultative parthenogenesis happens in the wild," says Watts.
